#summary The <system> Tag

= Introduction =

The <system> tag describes the system this game was designed under.
This tag is not not currently rendered by the parser; it is for reference only.


= Details =

A Nerdcules character sheet may have one `<system>` tag. This is an optional tag. If it appears, it must be inside the [TagHead <head>] tag, and must be the first tag in sequence.

== Example ==

Please see the [TagHead <head>] tag for an example.
